protocol.name: P-MTAB-9904
text: Frozen leaf tissues (-80°) were crushed by using mortar and pistil; and RNA was extracted with the Plant RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9905
text: 15 plants were incubated in induction solution for 4 hours. Then the shoot apices were micro-dissected and shock-frozen in liquid nitrogen. Effective dexamethasone concentration was 15µM and cycloheximide concentration was 10 µM.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9906
protocol.text: 45 shoot apices were micro-dissected three days after germination and shock-frozen. RNA was extracted from pooled apices.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9907
text: Plants were of Columbia (Col-0) background and grown on MS-plates at 23 °C in long day (16 light/8h darkness) conditions.
(Parameters: start time = 10, time unit = days, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = MS)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9908
text: Plants were watered with 1% EtOH and covered with dome for 12h. Then, apices were micro-dissected and immediately transferred to liquid nitrogen. Each sample consisted of 25 apices.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9909
text: 1. Add H2O to ChIP precipitate (final volume 100 µl) 2. Add 13.5 µl Blunting Mix 3. Incubate in Thermocycler (20' 12°C) 4. Clean up reaction using Qiagen Reaction Cleanup Kit 5. Elute in 25 µl EB 6. Add 25 µl cold ligation mix 7. Incubate o.N. @ 16°C 8. Cleanup using Qiagen Reaction Cleanup Kit 9. Elute in 25 µl EB 10. Perform LM PCR (22Cycles) 11. Cleanup using Qiagen PCR Cleanup kit 12. Elute in 25 µl 13. Perform qrt for positive control, check on Bionalyzer and with Nanodrop 14. If more DNA needed take 10µl of 1st LM PCR, add 15µl H2O and perform 2nd LM PCR (6Cycles) 15. Cleanup using Qiagen PCR Cleanup kit 16. Elute in 40µl 17. Perform qrt, check on Bionalyzer and with Nanodrop 18. Use 500 ng to perform fragmentation, labeling and hybridzation according to Affymetrix ChIP on chip protocol Reactions Blunting DNA Ends Single Reaction 10X T4-Polymerase Buffer 11,35 10mg/ml BSA 0,5 20mM dNTP 0,5 T4 DNA Polymerase 3U/µl NEB 0,2 PNK 1 ATP (1mM) 0,26 Sum 13,55 Ligation of Linkers Single Reaction 10XLigase Buffer 5 15µM annealed linkers 6,7 T4 DNA Ligase NEB 0,5 H2O 13 Sum 25,2 First Round LM-PCR Single Reaction 10XQiagen Taq Buffer 5 2.5 mM dNTP/dUTP 5 40 uM oJW102 (G-10324) 1,25 Qiagen Taq 1 dH20 12,75 Sum 25 Second Round LM-PCR 10XQiagen Taq Buffer 5 2.5 mM dNTP/dUTP 5 40 uM oJW102 (G-10324) 1,25 Qiagen Taq 1 dH20 27,75 Sum 40 Linker Annealing 1. Dilute Linker Oligos (G-10324/10325) to 40µM 2. Prepare Annealing Mix 3. Heat Mix to 95°C 4. Let cool down to RT in Heating Block with Aluminium/tissue-paper lid on top 5. If to be frozen and stored, incubate o.N. @4°C G-10324 (5’-GCGGTGACCCGGGAGATCTGAATTC-3’, HPLC purified) G-10325 (5’-GAATTCAGATC-3’, HPLC purified) Annealing Mix [µl] 1M Tris, pH7.9 25 40µM G-10324 37,5 40µM G-10325 37,5
(Parameters: Amount of nucleic acid labeled = 200, Amplification = PCR, Mass unit = Nano gram)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9910
text: 1. fix tissue with 0.3% formaldehyde in MC buffer  for 1 h under vacuum (turn on and off vacuum like 4 times and give sufficient time to adapt)
2. Wash 3* with MC buffer and transfer tissue into liquid nitrogen
3. Wet Miracloth filter with M1 buffer
5. Transfer 0.4 g pulverized tissue on Miracloth filter
6. Add 15 ml M1 buffer per sample and filtrate slurry through Miracloth into a falcon tube
7. Reapply flow through 2 times upon filter
8. spin solution at 1,000 x g, for 10 min at 4°C
9. wash pellet 5 times with 1 ml M2-Buffer (centrifuge in between with 2000 x g 5’ 4°C)-  avoid strong forces (use disposable Pasteur-pipettes)!
10. wash pellet with M3 Buffer (1ml) (2000 x g 5’ 4°C)
11. resuspend crude nuclear pellet in 1 ml Sonic buffer
12.  solubilize chromatin with probe sonicator with microtip (Output 3; Continous pulse, 10 * 10’’), keep samples on ice and let cool down between each ultrasonic treatment;
13.  centrifuge (microcentrifuge, top speed) for 5 min at 4°C
14. mix 750 µl of the supernatant with equal amount of IP buffer and take the rest (~250 µl) as input DNA (store at -20°C until Step 28)
15. add 2.5µl AB (that gives the same final  dilution as I succesfully used in western blots) to sample
19. incubate on a rotating wheel for 1.5h at 4°C
20. pellett beads by spin top speed, 2 min, 4°C (save supernatant as ‚post bind fraction’; store at -20°C until step 28)
21. wash 5* with 1ml IP-Buffer on rotating wheel (4 times at 4°C and last wash at RT)
22. transfer beads and wash to a new tube
23. elute with 100 µl ice cold glycine elution buffer : vortex 30’’, then spin Top speed 1’ RT
24. transfer supernatant to tube with 50 µl of TRIS pH9
27. transfer supernatant to new tube (note that following procedures are performed on input, post bind fraction and precipitate!!!)
28. add 1 µl RNase A (10 mg/ml) to each tube
29. incubate for 15’ 37°C (optional: take away an aliquot to check for protein)
32. add second aliquot of proteinase K (Roche)
35. precipitate DNA with 2.5 vol ethanol, 1/10 vol 3M NaAc pH 5.4, and 1 µl glycogen (or preferably with MinElute Columns)
36.  Resuspend DNA in 10-30 µl 10 mM Tris, pH 8
Complete Protease Inhibitor Cocktail (Roche Diagnostics GmbH, Mannhein, Germany)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9911
text: Plants were of Columbia (Col-0) background and grown on soil at 23 °C in continuous light at 65% relative humidity.
(Parameters: start time = 3, time unit = days, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = Soil)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9912
text: 1. Add H2O to ChIP precipitate (final volume 100 µl)
4. Clean up reaction using Qiagen Reaction Cleanup Kit
8. Cleanup using Qiagen Reaction Cleanup Kit
11. Cleanup using Qiagen PCR Cleanup kit
13. Perform qrt for positive control, check on Bionalyzer and with Nanodrop
14. If more DNA needed take 10µl of 1st LM PCR, add 15µl H2O
15.  Cleanup using Qiagen PCR Cleanup kit
17. Perform qrt, check on Bionalyzer and with Nanodrop
18. Use 500 ng to perform fragmentation, labeling and hybridzation according to Affymetrix ChIP on chip protocol
4. Let cool down to RT in Heating Block with Aluminium/tissue-paper lid on top
5. If to be frozen and stored, incubate o.N. @4°C
(Parameters: Amount of nucleic acid labeled = 500, Amplification = PCR, Mass unit = Nano gram)
